actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: To amend section 236 of the National Housing Act and section 101 of the Housing and Urban Development Act of 1965 to reduce from 35 to 20 per centum of the tenant's income the maximum rent which may be charged for a dwelling unit in a section 236 project or a dwelling unit qualifying for assistance under the rent supplement program.

summary.text: Reduces from 25 to 20 percent of the tenant's income the maximum rent which may be charged for a dwelling unit qualifying for assistance under the rent supplement program of the National Housing Act and the Housing and Urban Development Act.

titles.title: To amend section 236 of the National Housing Act and section 101 of the Housing and Urban Development Act of 1965 to reduce from 35 to 20 per centum of the tenant's income the maximum rent which may be charged for a dwelling unit in a section 236 project or a dwelling unit qualifying for assistance under the rent supplement program.
